family.name: DAC10
family.comment: DAC10 is a stationary decoder, but it can be programmed in the usual way

enumChoice.choice: Trigger OFF to ON, rising edge
Trigger ON to OFF, falling edge
Trigger on both edges of input
Trigger on rising edge if output CLOSED, or trigger on falling edge if output THROWN
Trigger OFF to ON, rising edge, disabled if CD in use
Trigger ON to OFF, falling edge, disabled if CD in use
Trigger on both edges of input, disabled if CD in use
Trigger on rising edge if output CLOSED, or trigger on falling edge if output THROWN, disabled if CD in use
Input trigger has no effect on output
Restore to last state on trigger
